1.Title: Frost-Stained Star
1.Description: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>. When using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or when any squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, the equipper's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 15s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
